feature_support.notes: string type is valid IEEE 1800-2017 SystemVerilog

cross_tool_validation.icarus_note: Icarus does not support string as port type, but this is an Icarus limitation

classification.reason: Valid SystemVerilog test case (slang/verilator pass), CIRCT crashes instead of providing error message

notes: While Icarus Verilog rejects string port type, both slang and verilator accept it as valid SystemVerilog. CIRCT should either support this feature or emit a proper diagnostic, not crash.
